PARAM.name: dscp
PARAM.help: Consider only packets matching DSCP value

PARAM.name: dscp-val
PARAM.help: Consider only packets matching DSCP value

PARAM.name: fragment
PARAM.help: Check all fragments of a packet

PARAM.name: dscp
PARAM.help: Consider only packets matching DSCP value

PARAM.name: dscp-val
PARAM.help: Consider only packets matching DSCP value

PARAM.name: fragment
PARAM.help: Check all fragments of a packet

PARAM.name: arg1-eq
PARAM.help: Match only packets on a given port number

PARAM.name: arg1-gt
PARAM.help: Match only packets with a greater port number

PARAM.name: arg1-lt
PARAM.help: Match only packets with a lower port number

PARAM.name: arg1-neq
PARAM.help: Match only packets not on a given port number

PARAM.name: arg1-range
PARAM.help: Match only packets in the range of port numbers

PARAM.name: arp
PARAM.help: Enable rate policing of ARP control packets

PARAM.name: frrp
PARAM.help: Enable rate policing of FRRP control packets

PARAM.name: gvrp
PARAM.help: Enable rate policing of GVRP control packets

PARAM.name: is-is
PARAM.help: Enable rate policing of IS-IS control packets

PARAM.name: lacp
PARAM.help: Enable rate policing of LACP control packets

PARAM.name: lldp
PARAM.help: Enable rate policing of LLDP control packets

PARAM.name: stp
PARAM.help: Enable rate policing of STP control packets

PARAM.name: direction-switch
PARAM.help: Configure the direction to apply the access list

PARAM.help: Configure the direction to apply the access list

PARAM.help: Configure the direction to apply the access list

PARAM.name: eq
PARAM.help: Exact prefix length to be matched

PARAM.name: ge
PARAM.help: Minimum prefix length to be matched

PARAM.name: le
PARAM.help: Maximum prefix length to be matched

PARAM.name: le
PARAM.help: Maximum prefix length to be matched

PARAM.name: local-AS
PARAM.help: Do not send outside local AS (well-known community)

PARAM.name: no-advertise
PARAM.help: Do not advertise to any peer (well-known community)

PARAM.name: no-export
PARAM.help: Do not export to next AS (well-known community)
